name: Land of Might 2
description:
In a land of... MIGHT, there exists two things, those who fall to Might and those who harness Might itself.

Summary:

Land of Might 2 is a perma-death Role Playing Game similar to the hit game Land of Might. In this game, you play as a battle-hardened adventurer who has seized Might for himself. In his quest he must battle against hordes of the undead and holy spirits to become one with Might. 

Controls:

To start, you must type your name and choose a difficulty. To start, you will press the start button. You must left click to shoot and keep yourself from succumbing to all encompassing Might.

Link to the Official Land of Might Discord Server: https://discord.gg/YjgR8fK2

Official Land of Might Website: https://landofmight.alwaysdata.net
